children.name: all
children.sourceText: For thou hast said that God himself should come down among the children of men; and now, for this cause thou shalt be put to death unless thou wilt recall all the words which thou hast spoken evil concerning me and my people.

children.name: among
children.sourceText: I command you to bring Abinadi hither, that I may slay him, for he has said these things that he might stir up my people to anger one with another, and to raise contentions among my people; therefore I will slay him.

children.name: an
children.sourceText: Abinadi, we have found an accusation against thee, and thou art worthy of death.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: Who is Abinadi, that I and my people should be judged of him, or who is the Lord, that shall bring upon my people such great affliction?

children.name: another
children.sourceText: I command you to bring Abinadi hither, that I may slay him, for he has said these things that he might stir up my people to anger one with another, and to raise contentions among my people; therefore I will slay him.

children.name: shall

children.name: should

children.name: thee
children.sourceText: Abinadi, we have found an accusation against thee, and thou art worthy of death.

children.name: therefore
children.sourceText: I command you to bring Abinadi hither, that I may slay him, for he has said these things that he might stir up my people to anger one with another, and to raise contentions among my people; therefore I will slay him.

children.name: these
children.sourceText: I command you to bring Abinadi hither, that I may slay him, for he has said these things that he might stir up my people to anger one with another, and to raise contentions among my people; therefore I will slay him.

children.name: they
children.sourceText: Gideon, spare me, for the Lamanites are upon us, and they will destroy us; yea, they will destroy my people.

children.name: this
children.sourceText: Away with this fellow, and slay him; for what have we to do with him, for he is mad.

children.name: thou
children.sourceText: Abinadi, we have found an accusation against thee, and thou art worthy of death.
